params.collateralAddress: ERC20 token that is used as the underlying collateral for the synthetic.
params.finderAddress: UMA protocol Finder used to discover other protocol contracts.
params.isTest: whether this contract is being constructed for the purpose of running tests.

payFees().details: These must be paid periodically for the life of the contract. If the contract has not paid its regular fee in a week or mre then a late penalty is applied which is sent to the caller.

returns.totalPaid: The amount of collateral that the contract paid (sum of the amount paid to the Store and the caller).

pfc().details: Derived contracts are expected to implement this function so the payFees() method can correctly compute the owed regular fees.

setCurrentTime(uint256).details: Will revert if not running in test mode.

methods.constructor: Constructs the FeePayer contract. Called by child contracts.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current time. Will return the last time set in `setCurrentTime` if running in test mode. Otherwise, it will return the block timestamp.

payFees().notice: Pays UMA DVM regular fees to the Store contract.

pfc().notice: Gets the current profit from corruption for this contract in terms of the collateral currency.

userdoc.notice: Provides fee payment functionality for the ExpiringMultiParty contract. contract is abstract as each derived contract that inherits `FeePayer` must implement `pfc()`.
